verses.roman:
ataeva gopī-gaṇera nāhi kāma-gandha
kṛṣṇa-sukha lāgi mātra, kṛṣṇa se sambandha

synonyms: ataeva—therefore; gopī-gaṇera—of the gopīs; nāhi—not; kāma-gandha—the slightest bit of lust; kṛṣṇa-sukha—the happiness of Lord Kṛṣṇa; lāgi—for; mātra—only; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; se—that; sambandha—the relationship.
translation: Thus there is not the slightest taint of lust in the gopīs' love. Their relationship with Kṛṣṇa is only for the sake of His enjoyment.
